channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Oriol
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Oriol

item.title: Project 2: Parallel Coordinates. Car Transmission
item.description: In this second project we explore the not-so-popular Parallel Coordinates charts. We selected the classic dataset “mtcars” which contains data extracted from the 1974 Motor Trend Magazine and has information about the performance of 32 cars on 11 different variables. Our goal is to find unknown patterns that help distinguish between Automatic and Manual Transmission cars by its performance. We created two Parallel Coordinate figures with the following variables: qsec: ¼ mile time in seconds hp: Gross horsepower disp: Displacement (cu.

item.title: Project 1: Animated Figures. GDP and Life Expectancy
item.description: GDP Evolution has always been one of my favourite topics. Why are some countries richer than others? Are poorer countries really catching up? The fact is that GDP per capita seems to be positively correlated with Life Expectancy, and I thought it would be valuable to visualize how they have evolved over the last decades. The goal of this project is to dynamically visualize the GDP per capita evolution, life expectancy and population growth by continent over the years.
